text: Justo Gallego Martínez (20 September 1925 – 28 November 2021), also known as Don Justo, was a Spanish monk. He was known for building a church buildings in Mejorada del Campo since 1961. Most of the construction materials used were recycled materials. Don Justo dedicated the building to Our Lady of the Pillar (Nuestra Señora del Pilar). Gallego Martínez died in Madrid on 28 November 2021, at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish architects Category:Christian monks Category:People from Madrid
